headline: Monster Beverage Leverages Functional, Zero-Sugar Innovations To Capture Energy Drink Market Growth
summary: Monster Beverage Corporation (NASDAQ:MNST) shares are trading higher on Friday. On Thursday, the company reported second-quarter results, where net sales increased 11.1% to $2.11 billion from $1.90 billion in the same period last year. Goldman Sachs analyst Bonnie Herzog reiterated the Buy rating on Monster, raising the price forecast from $72 to $73. Also Read: Celsius Holdings Q2 FY2025 Earnings Call Transcript Herzog said expectations were elevated for Monster Beverage’s second-quarter result

headline: Monster (MNST) Shares Skyrocket, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of energy drink company Monster Beverage (NASDAQ:MNST) jumped 6.7% in the morning session after reporting record-breaking second-quarter sales and profits that surpassed analyst expectations. The energy drink maker announced net sales of $2.11 billion for the second quarter, an 11.1% increase compared to the same period in 2024. This performance beat analyst expectations of $2.08 billion and marked the first time the company's quarterly revenue surpassed the $2 billion threshold. The comp

headline: Monster’s (NASDAQ:MNST) Q2 Sales Beat Estimates, Stock Soars
summary: Energy drink company Monster Beverage (NASDAQ:MNST) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 11.1% year on year to $2.11 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.51 per share was 6.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

content.title: Monster’s (NASDAQ:MNST) Q2 Sales Beat Estimates, Stock Soars
content.summary: Energy drink company Monster Beverage (NASDAQ:MNST) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 11.1% year on year to $2.11 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.51 per share was 6.7% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
